nodes.text: You cannot repair the water pump without a replacement vacuum pump.
This water pump may need a new fuse.
This item cannot be used on the pump.
You are having difficulties making these parts work.
The massive pump struggles to life after you successfully install the missing parts.
The water pump isn't working due to a broken vacuum pump.
You fail to repair the water pump.
This water pump isn't working due to a broken vacuum pump.
You gain 1000 experience points for fixing the pump.
You somehow manage to destroy the parts while cutting your hand for 1 point of damage.
